titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the stamp commemorating the Oregon National Historic Trail should be issued in Oregon City, Oregon.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the stamp commemorating the Oregon National Historic Trail should be issued in Oregon City, Oregon.
